sentences.english: It too came to naught, when Mr Yang was arrested in China for tax evasion.
sentences.chinese: 它最後也夭折，當時楊斌因爲在中國逃稅而被逮捕。

sentences.english: Yang pointed out that the incidence of sexually transmitted diseases in rural areas of Guangdong is not optimistic.
sentences.chinese: 楊斌指出，廣東農村地區性病發病率不容樂觀。
